name: Lethal Operation Rei Hen
description: Lethal Operation Rei Hen is a horizontally scrolling shooter, developed by 大雪戦 and it is the fifth installment in the Lethal series. Lethal Operation Rei Hen takes place in an unspecified future where mankind use robots for various purposes. Like their human creators, some robots involve themselves in destructive crime, and government sent special units known as autonomous mechanism universal warfare to stop them. Unlike the previous games that focus on action platformer, Lethal Operation Rei Hen is a shooter but with many added options. The player takes control of the protagonist Ray or Rugitta and shoots through five stages, using three basic attacks; normal shot, charge attack and special. Defeated enemies sometimes drop power-ups or points which can be used to purchase new abilities or to enhance character status. Players can increase their points and score multiplier by creating chains or destroying enemies in a row. Lethal Operation Rei Hen was released on Nopember 15, 2015.
